attributes.action: NOT to re-open any more airfields for civil flying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are currently plenty of civil airfields that "are popular with aviation enthusiasts", we do not need any more.
Re-opening airfields will not "bring in lots of tourists to an area" as there are not enough people to make use of the facilities.

Please note that I am not opposed to keeping existing airfields open.
